channel.title: War Action Sex on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Action Sex on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: A very good sentence...
item.description: “Fixated offenders are not aware of the inherent detrimental nature of their actions because they exhibit a primitive sense of identification with children and that coupled with their distorted view of sexuality provokes them to believe that their actions are innocuous.” - k*star
